selected_quotes: Revised preprint: Oxford Nanopore Sequencing, Hybrid Error Correction, and de novo Assembly of a Eukaryotic Genome.
CSHL team writes new algorithm, gets highly accurate sequence from high-error Oxford Nanopore Minion #bioeconomy
.@mike_schatz is describing his Oxford Nanopore MinION work. Learn more in his preprint #PAGXXIII
Oxford Nanopore Sequencing de novo Assembly of a Eukaryotic Genome
Nanopore beats Illumina in assembling a genome. Not bad
